ARABIC: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَٰهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But Pharaoh disobeyed the Messenger, so We seized him with terrible severity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But the Pharaoh disobeyed the apostle; so We seized him with a grievous punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But Pharaoh disobeyed Our Messenger, so We seized him with a terrible seizing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: However, the Pharaoh disobeyed the Messenger and We seized him with a severe retribution.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In response Firaun disobeyed the Noble Messenger, so We seized him with a severe seizure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But Fir`awn disobeyed the Messenger; so We seized him with a severe punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But Firon disobeyed the apostle, so We laid on him a violent hold.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: but Pharaoh rebelled against the Messenger, so We seized him remorselessly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But Pharaoh rebelled against the messenger, whereupon We seized him with no gentle grip.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But Pharoah rebelled against the messenger, so We seized him with a strong, crushing grip.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then Fir'awn disobeyed the apostle, wherefore We laid hold of him with a painful hold.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But Pharaoh disobeyed the apostle; so We seized him with a terrible seizing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger; so We seized him with a heavy Punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But Fir'aun (Pharaoh) disobeyed the Messenger [Musa (Moses)], so We seized him with a severe punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Pharaoh disobeyed Our Messenger, so We seized him remorselessly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But Pharaoh defied the Messenger, so We seized him with a terrible seizing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [73:16] But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a severe seizing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But Pharaoh rebelled against the messenger) i.e. Moses, and did not accept his call, (whereupon We seized him with no gentle grip) therefore We punished him with a severe punishment, i.e. by drowning.
